Here are some suggestions for navigating a bank privately:

1. Ask the bank staff if they have a private area where you can conduct your business. Some banks have designated areas for customers who want extra privacy.
2. Use the bank's ATMs or online banking services to access your accounts without having to physically visit the bank. This way, you can avoid CCTV cameras altogether.
3. If you must visit the bank in person, try to go during less busy hours when there are fewer people around. This can reduce the likelihood of being caught on CCTV cameras.
